thread.title: IS claims responsibility for the Istanbul night club shooting
thread.title_full: IS claims responsibility for the Istanbul night club shooting

author: AP
title: IS claims responsibility for the Istanbul night club shooting
text:
January 02, 2017 14:19   14:21 IST more-in Islamic State 
The Islamic State group has claimed responsibility for the Istanbul night club shooting. 
Turkish police struggled to track down a gunman who attacked New Yearâ€™s Eve revelers at a popular Istanbul nightclub, killing at least 39 people, including two Indians. 
Close to 70 more were wounded. 
The attacker, armed with a long-barrelled weapon, killed a policeman and a civilian outside the Reina club around 1:15 am before entering and firing at people partying inside, Istanbul Governor Vasip Sahin said.
